CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 16, 1945, pg. 26, reads: "Gay Reception - More than one hundred guests gathered at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Harold Tardy on Susquehanna Street for the reception given in honor of their daughter, Margaret Craig, and Corp. James Wesley Miles, who were married in Atlanta Ga., last November. In the receiving line with Mrs. Tardy were Mrs. Edna Hunt, sister of the groom; Mmes Florence Ball Jones, Aline Herd, Minnie Branch, Jessie Bolden and Marleta Jones. Assisting Mrs. Miles were Misses Jane Bailey, Ruth Gwyn, Flora Fellows, Lenis Brooks, Marion Tardy, Ada Gay Bruce and Mrs. Eugenia Thomas. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of two men, including groom Corp. James Wesley Miles wearing military uniform, and seven women, including bride Margaret Craig Miles gathered in home of her parents, Mrs. and Harold Tardy, Susquehanna Street, Homewood
